english.segment1: As Your love sings a melody. Let our lives live in harmony. One big holy symphony. For all to see In unity. Ahhhhhhmeeeeeeeeeeeeeen Ahhhhhhhmen
english.segment2: CHORUS: Praises be to the King. His majesty reigns on high. Praises be to the King. His majesty reigns on high
english.segment3: Let Your spirit move sovereignly. Let our hearts be touched tenderly. Let Your love grow inside of me. For all to see so endlessly. Ahhhhhhmeeeeeeeeeeeeeen Ahhhhhhhmen
